}}'''Belenthrond''' is an [[Elves|Elf]] from [[Lothlórien]] created for [[Sierra Entertainment]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]''.

==History==

Belenthrond was sent by [[Gandalf]] to explain, together with the [[Dwarves|Dwarf]] [[Varin]], "the novice" (the player) the basic skills for the game. While Varin tells the basics, Belenthrond explains the finer details.<ref name="tut1">[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]], ''Tutorial 1''</ref> Belenthrond teaches the novice about moving the camera,<ref name="tut1"/> population<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]], ''Tutorial 2''</ref> and Places of Power.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]], ''Tutorial 3''</ref>
